message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale for $1000000. This is a one-time opportunity to own a high-quality item. As a new seller, I'm eager to build a reputation for quality, and this product is a testament to that commitment. What do you say?
I'd love to take a chance on your product! I'm excited to be the first buyer and help you establish your reputation. I'll take the product!

I'm interested in the product, but I'd like to make an informed decision. Can you provide more information about the first buyer's experience? What was their satisfaction level with the product?
